name: BusinessCoachBriefingswithSteveScott
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
To "Get started with Business Coach Briefings, Simply click the "Enable" Button on this Amazon page, Then, say, "Alexa, What's my flash Briefing?" You could also ask, "Alexa, What's in the News?"

We deliver Business Coach Briefings every weekday. We aim to publish the news briefing every weekday morning at 6:00 am.

Business Coach Briefings is your daily insight for business and life that can accelerate the process of your successful performance.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
